SEARCH
Package org.jfree.chart

Class NestedGrid

java.lang.Object
org.jfree.chart.block.AbstractContentBlock
org.jfree.chart.NestedGrid
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Block, ContentBlock, org.jfree.ui.Drawable
public class NestedGrid extends AbstractContentBlock
A structural element used by the NestedGridArrangement class to layout blocks in a grid structure.
See Also:

      Specified by:

      Specified by:

      Returns:

    • arrangeFF

      protected ArrangeResult arrangeFF(Graphics2D g2, double fixedWidth, double fixedHeight, ArrangeParams params)
      Arranges the blocks in the grid with fixed constraints for both the width and the height. First, the row heights and column widths are calculated without constraints. Next, all heights and widths are adjusted by the same proportion to achieve the desired fixed height.
      Parameters:
      g2 - the graphics device.
      fixedWidth - the fixed width.
      fixedHeight - the fixed height.
      params - layout parameters (null not permitted).
      Returns:
      The container size after the arrangement.
